title: i can never update my current lol files they get to a certain point in update
body: every single update i have had i have to delete game files and re download the whole thing witch takes to long is there any solutions to fix this problem? please help when updating it comes up as error please check logs for more information please help

replies.body: What type of error do you encounter? Is it "Unspecified" at around 32%? Also, what OS are you on, and who's your ISP?

i have the 32 percent problem what do i do ?
